name: Hyperglide
description:
Hyperglide is an FPS platformer game about escaping the crumbling and fading sky islands of a deserted world. The game is built on dynamic pacing through its more linear high-velocity platforming sections (inspired by Mirror's Edge and Bhop) as well as its deliberately placed environmental storytelling and narrative-focused areas.

Made for UT Game Development and Design course 2021/2022 fall

  • Markus Aksli
  • Mark Robin Kalder
  • Karl-Hendrik Veidenberg
  • Ivan Hladkyi

WASD - move

Left Shift - sprint

Space - jump

CTRL or C - crouch/slide

F - interact
